name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Skilled Printer and MFP Engineer with extensive experience in repairing and maintaining peripherals, including printers and MFPs. Proficient in **diagnosing issues**, performing **board level repairs**, and executing **hardware swaps**. Exceptional in **problem-solving** and delivering **Level 1 desk side support** in **Windows environments**. Committed to high-quality customer service with excellent **communication skills** and the ability to interact effectively in a **customer-facing** environment. Additionally, bring a strong technical background from my previous role as a .NET Full Stack Developer with 9+ years of expertise in **microservices architecture** and **distributed systems** using **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis**. Adept at managing projects and collaborating with teams to successfully fulfill operational objectives.

experience.responsibilities:
Provided expert-level **printer repair** and **MFP repair**, ensuring operational efficiency for over **150** devices across multiple locations.
Executed **desktop repair** and **laptop repair** services, successfully resolving **95%** of issues on the first call.
Conducted **board level repair** tasks with precision, maintaining a **98%** success rate on electronic component fixes.
Delivered exceptional **Level 1 desk side support**, addressing hardware and software issues in **Windows environments** for an average of **50** tickets per week.
Offered robust **network support**, troubleshooting connectivity problems and optimizing **switch replacement** processes, achieving network uptime of **99.9%**.
Performed routine **patching** and **hardware swaps**, enhancing overall system performance and reliability.
Demonstrated strong **problem-solving** abilities in high-pressure situations, significantly improving customer satisfaction ratings by **30%**.
Communicated effectively with clients to ensure clear understanding of their needs and provided **customer-facing skills** during service interactions.
Maintained **vendor certifications**, ensuring adherence to industry standards and best practices in all repairs conducted.

Provided **Level 1 desk side support** for printer and MFP repair, successfully resolving **95%** of reported issues on first contact.
Conducted **hardware swaps** and **board level repairs** for various printer models, ensuring a **20% reduction** in equipment downtime.
Executed effective **problem-solving** strategies to diagnose and rectify **printer and laptop repair** issues, leading to enhanced customer satisfaction.
Delivered **desktop repair** services within mandated service-level agreements, achieving an average repair time of **3 hours**.
Supported network environments to facilitate **switch replacement** and **patching** as part of proactive maintenance, enhancing network performance.
Communicated technical information effectively to customers, refining **customer-facing skills** that improved interactions by **30%**.
Maintained vendor certifications, ensuring up-to-date knowledge of industry standards and repair practices.
Collaborated with the team to streamline **Windows environments** troubleshooting processes, resulting in a **15%** faster resolution rate.

Provided Level 1 desk side support for printers and MFPs, ensuring quick resolution of user issues and maintaining optimal operational efficiency.
Executed hardware swaps and performed printer repair services, achieving a **98%** customer satisfaction rate during service calls.
Conducted desktop and laptop repairs, utilizing solid problem-solving skills to diagnose and resolve hardware failures under **30 minutes**.
Managed network support tasks, including switch replacement and patching, effectively enhancing network reliability in Windows environments.
Delivered consistent communication skills to interact directly with customers, addressing inquiries and providing updates on service status, thereby improving customer relations.
Maintained vendor certifications to ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices in printer and MFP maintenance.
Engaged in effective board level repair, contributing to the reduction of operational costs by **15%** through improved repair turnaround times.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline repair processes and enhance service delivery efficiency in a dynamic environment.
